::Megatron X::

Out of a murky swamp, a dark figure rose out of it, with  Dragon claws for 
one hand and a tankTurret on his shoulder. A huge piece of dead flesh, 
possibly a carcass, protouded out of his huge Dragon mouth. He had jagged 
silver teeth, wand two huge black wings, shadowing over the tank turret.  Two 
ice blue eyes were at the top of the head, with a pair of devilish horns 
protrouding from the side of his head. He raised himself up and let out an 
earth-shattering roar, dropping the carcass into the water again. 

He staggered for about a kilometer and then transformed into a silver and 
black tank, the turret forming as his 'head. The only Dragon part of him left 
of him was his jet black wings. 

"I am back," He growled to himself.
He studied the surroundings on all sides of him. He noticed a four legged 
mobile creature, with horns and small tail. He suddendly Transformed into a 
Dragon and ate the horned creature, with utter content. He laughed to himself 
and then walked darker into the deep wooded area.
